sentences.en: a boring movie full of bad dialog
sentences.cn: 充满差劲对白的乏味电影

sentences.en: A Move dialog would then appear with the current document highlighted.
sentences.cn: 这时“移动”对话框便弹出,并且突出显示当前的文档.

sentences.en: A properties dialog box generally controls the current selection.
sentences.cn: 一般来说,属性对话框控制当前的选择.

sentences.en: Address every primary view and dialog possible.
sentences.cn: 要尽可能考虑到所有主要的视图和对话.

sentences.en: An error dialog should always be polite, illuminating, and helpful.
sentences.cn: 错误消息框应该始终有礼貌 、 具有启发性, 还要助人为乐.

sentences.en: Are you canceling the dialog and leaving the rules mismatched?
sentences.cn: 我们是撤销对话框保留不匹配的规则?

sentences.en: Can you rearrange things on the window or dialog to expand horizontally?
sentences.cn: 是否可以重新安排窗口或对话框中的内容,在水平方向扩展一些?

sentences.en: Do your users a favor and never create another confirmation dialog box.
sentences.cn: 请为你的用户做点好事,不要再创建另外的确认对话框了.

sentences.en: For other pages/dialogs, it should go back one page or close the dialog.
sentences.cn: 至于其他页面/对话框，它应该回退一个页面或者关闭对话框。

sentences.en: In this dialog, you can only open an artifact in the editor.
sentences.cn: 在这个对话框中，您只可以在编辑器中打开一个工件。

sentences.en: Modeless dialog boxes frequently have several buttons that immediately invoke various functions.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记非模态对话框中经常会有几个按钮,可以立即激活不同的功能.

sentences.en: Property dialog boxes can be either modal or modeless.
sentences.cn: 属性对话框可以是模态的,也可以是非模态的.

sentences.en: Students were asked to read simple dialogs out loud.
sentences.cn: 学生被要求大声朗读简单的对话。

sentences.en: The dialog box, another use of the pop - up window , was the tool that simplified the menu.
sentences.cn: 另外一种 弹出窗口 的使用方式, 对话框就是简化菜单的工具.

sentences.en: The pantry plays a secondary role, as should dialog boxes.
sentences.cn: 食品储藏室应该处于从属地位, 对话框也应该如此.

sentences.en: Think of the dialog as being in either beginner or advanced mode.
sentences.cn: 你可能认为这种对话框既适用于初学者,也适用于高级用户.

sentences.en: Use consistent terminating commands for modeless dialog boxes.
sentences.cn: 为非模态对话框提供一致的终止命令.

sentences.en: Use object names in property dialog title bars.
sentences.cn: 在属性对话框的标题中使用对象名.

sentences.en: Use verbs in function dialog title bars.
sentences.cn: 在功能对话框的标题中使用动词.

trans.tran_en: a conversation in a book, play, or film
